unnormalised: Arrey bhai, invitation-acher address mhunnlear "Hall No. 4, Community Centre, Sector 62, Noida, UP, 201309" asa. Aasha asa Google Maps-ak tem melltele! Fattim mhaka Sector 62-ak vochonk aslem tedna, kiteim korun Greater Noida-ant paule. Ani BTW, "Community Centre" mhunnlear konachea kaka-chea bagentlea shed-achem code asa kai? Fottkiro! (Chodd korun). Thoi bhetteaum, aasha asa bare address-acher!
normalised: Arrey bhai, invite-acher address mhunnlelear "Hall Number four, Community Centre, Sector sixty two, Noida, U-P, two zero one three zero nine" asa. Google Maps-ak mellttolo mhunn umed kortam! Fattle pavtt sector sixty two-ak gelear, hanv koso tori Greater Noida-nt paule. Ani B-T-W, "Community Centre" mhunnlear konnachya mama-chea bagichea shedd-acho code asa kai? Mazak kortam! (Chodd korun). Thoinch bhetttolya, asa kortam chukichea address-acher nhoi!
